apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss: man, woman emoji captures a tender moment with two figures of medium-light skin tones leaning in for a kiss, their forms defined by Apple's signature soft rounded edges and glossy 3D shading. The smooth gradients and subtle highlights convey a sense of warmth and romantic connection that feels particularly intimate on Apple devices. This emoji on Apple devices is an excellent way to express love, affection, or a budding romance in your digital communications.
